name: Blockies Adventure
description:
Blockies Adventure

In Blockies Adventure, you are playing as Blockie, the cube girl. You will face different obstacles to come over. In your adventure, using the minimal power ups will grant you the highest score for that level. You have to invent different paths for each level to get the highest score !

Features
  • 40 total unique level
  • Different level set for each upgrade
  • Chill platformer feel
  • Easy to play
  • Full controller support
Keys/ButtonsFor keyboard

Arrow keys for moving

Spacebar for jumping

R for restarting the level

Enter for interacting

For gamepad

A for jumping

Y for interacting

Left control stick for moving

Change Log
  • Fixed a bug where level transitions caused some screen errors
  • Added a restart instructions
